Consttructor,to generate the 12-tone Matrix from the original row.

Constructor, to generate the 12-tone Matrix from the original row using integer array "list".
matrix - Variable in class Home.Matrix
The 12-tone matrix 2-dimensional array
Melody_Generation(String, int) - Method in class Home.Matrix
Generate 12-Tone Matrix and choose Prime/Retrograde/Inversion/Retrograde Inversion Row and combine them into the melody series, combine them into tones of 1-4 pitches and insert pauses according to the Son Clave Rhythm(3122224) to generate the final melodySoundList.
melodySoundList - Variable in class Home.Matrix
The 12-tone melody with pause to conduct Son Clave rhythm
minuet - Variable in class Home.Matrix
The tones of Bach's Minuet

minuetDurationRow - Variable in class Home.Matrix

The duration row list for Minuet
minuetTimePoint - Variable in class Home.Matrix
The minuet tones with pause to conduct time point rhythm
minuetTPDurations - Variable in class Home.Matrix

minuetVolumes - Variable in class Home.Matrix

setUpPlayerMelody(Matrix) - Method in class Home.MusicPlayer
Set up the sequence for the 12-tone melody with Son Clave Rhythm, as well as write Midi file to MidiFile folder, and use midiPlayer Sequencer to play it.
setUpPlayerMinuetDurationRow(Matrix) - Method in class Home.MusicPlayer
Set up the sequence for Minuet with Duration Row Rhythm, as well as write Midi file to MidiFile folder, and use midiPlayer Sequencer to play it.
setUpPlayerMinueTimePoint(Matrix) - Method in class Home.MusicPlayer
Set up the sequence for Minuet with Time Point Rhythm, as well as write Midi file to MidiFile folder, and use midiPlayer Sequencer to play it.
setUpPlayerMinuetVolume(Matrix) - Method in class Home.MusicPlayer
Set up the sequence for Minuet with serial volume, as well as write Midi file to MidiFile folder, and use midiPlayer Sequencer to play it.
setUpPlayerTimePoint(Matrix) - Method in class Home.MusicPlayer
Set up the sequence for the 12-tone melody with Time Point Rhythm, as well as write Midi file to MidiFile folder, and use midiPlayer Sequencer to play it.
setUpPlayerVolume(Matrix) - Method in class Home.MusicPlayer
Set up the sequence for the 12-tone melody with Time Point Rhythm and serial volume, as well as write Midi file to MidiFile folder, and use midiPlayer Sequencer to play it.
startMidi(String) - Method in class Home.MusicPlayer
Set up the sequencer midiPlayer to play a midi file once.
stop() - Method in class Home.MusicPlayer
